import axios from"axios";export default{// Search books
searchBooks:function searchBooks(query){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+query);},// Adds (saves) a book to user's bookshelf
addBook:function addBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},// Gets saved books
savedBooks:function savedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/saved");},// Deletes book
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/saved/"+id);}};
